job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you passionate about using and embedding Generative AI (GenAI) responsibly in high-quality software solutions? Do you have a knack for DevOps practices and experience with cloud environments? We are seeking a DevOps Engineer to design, build, and run cutting-edge solutions that bring value to users while being enjoyable to develop.

   As a DevOps Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.
job_details.full_text:
DevOps Engineer

Are you passionate about using and embedding Generative AI (GenAI) responsibly in high-quality software solutions? Do you have a knack for DevOps practices and experience with cloud environments? We are seeking a DevOps Engineer to design, build, and run cutting-edge solutions that bring value to users while being enjoyable to develop.

   As a DevOps Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.

profile_classification.rationale: The job title is 'DevOps Engineer' and while it mentions 'Generative AI (GenAI)' and 'GenAI solutions', the core responsibilities and tasks described focus heavily on DevOps practices, collaboration, and solution delivery rather than the deep technical development, fine-tuning, or advanced prompt engineering typically associated with a GenAI Engineer. The role seems to be about embedding existing GenAI capabilities into solutions and managing their deployment, rather than building the GenAI models themselves. It also lacks specific technical depth in AI modeling or data engineering required for ML/GenAI Engineer roles. Therefore, it leans towards a role that uses AI tools rather than develops them, fitting the 'Ambiguous' profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements' directly relates to understanding the business context and translating needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions' and 'Develop reusable components from the solutions you create' implies building and integrating software components.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop reusable components from the solutions you create' implies building software components.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop reusable components from the solutions you create

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges' describes a software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable' covers the full lifecycle of deploying and maintaining software, which is core to MLOps/DevOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability' is a key aspect of DevOps and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board' indicates strong communication and collaboration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board
